TopicTitle: Can I see all BBCode in my post with a button?

Articles.Content: Pretty much, I'm editing my craft repository. I want to be able to ignore spoilers, and just remove spoiler tags without deleting the contents of said spoiler. Is that possible?

I don't think this forum software stores BBCode like the better ones do.   It converts it to some native proprietary and saves it that way.  As far as removing spoilers, you will have to copy and paste.

22 hours ago, Alshain said:

It converts it to some native proprietary and saves it that way.

Post content is stored as HTML, not exactly proprietary.
